metadata.title: CVE-2023-52753 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Avoid NULL dereference of timing generator [Why & How]Check whether assigned timing generator is NULL or not before accessing itsfuncs to prevent NULL dereference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
